Package org.cid15.aem.veneer.api.link.builders

Interface LinkBuilder

  • public interface LinkBuilder
    Builder for creating Link, ImageLink, and NavigationLink objects.

        LinkBuilder setExtension​(String extension)
        Set the extension, without '.'. Defaults to "html" if none is provided.
        Parameters:
        extension - link extension
        Returns:
        builder

      • setExternal

        LinkBuilder setExternal​(boolean isExternal)
        Set whether the link should be considered external, i.e. not a valid content path.
        Parameters:
        isExternal - if true, link is marked as external
        Returns:
        builder

      • setHost

        LinkBuilder setHost​(String host)
        Set the host. If the host is set, the href of the built link will be absolute rather than relative.
        Parameters:
        host - host name
        Returns:
        builder

      • setScheme

        LinkBuilder setScheme​(String scheme)
        Set the scheme (e.g. "ftp" or "tel").

        If set, the scheme will override the default value of "http" (or "https" if secure=true).

        Parameters:
        scheme - scheme
        Returns:
        builder

      • setOpaque

        LinkBuilder setOpaque​(boolean isOpaque)
        Set whether the link URI is opaque (an absolute URI whose scheme-specific part does not begin with a slash character).
        Parameters:
        isOpaque - if true, ":" instead of "://" will be appended to the scheme for external links (e.g. "mailto:" links)
        Returns:
        builder

      • setPort

        LinkBuilder setPort​(int port)
        Set the port.
        Parameters:
        port - port number
        Returns:
        builder

      • setSecure

        LinkBuilder setSecure​(boolean isSecure)
        Set secure. If true, the returned link will be "https" instead of "http". This only applies when a host name is set.
        Parameters:
        isSecure - secure
        Returns:
        builder

      • setSuffix

        LinkBuilder setSuffix​(String suffix)
        Set the suffix.
        Parameters:
        suffix - suffix
        Returns:
        builder
